content: Part of the reason why people are flocking to MOOCs is not simply because it’s more convenient — it’s because it’s more cost effective. I am not saying that these degrees should be free (after all you still need to pay the instructors and the like), but it’s ridiculous to share online degree programs that cost upwards of $20K since that is still way too much money for the person that probably needs the course material the most — namely an unemployed (or underemployed) person that has access to the Internet.
